feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.44
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update variables for quotes / credits in templates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10194
  • Add e_invoicing_token to fillable by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10184
  • Updates for client props by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10196
  • Updates for transforming PEPPOL by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10215
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10216
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10210
  • Preselecting token when available by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10191
  • Improve helper text for stripe payment methods by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10226
  • v5.10.44 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.43...v5.10.44

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.45
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for Twig Security Policies
  • Implementation of additional check data cli argument for client payment_balance
  • Fixes for XRechnung xml files imports (now support CII + UBL versions)
  • Implementation of xslt stylesheet formatting for e-invoicing validation + html display
  • Currency Translation Fixes by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10231
  • v5.10.45 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.44...v5.10.45

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.46
entry.content:
What's Changed

Updated translations Refactor quote email paths to accept template name Rollback for intercepting xml docs Support additional UBL namespaces when importing Activities for e-invoicing Always set email as a fallback for sending einvoices E-invoicing: Update company details after connecting to PEPPOL (#108) Refactor addadditionaltaxidentifier to admin module Updates for einvoicing via self host Fixes for has_sales_above_threshold prop

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.45...v5.10.46

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.47
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve compatibility with CIUS XRechnung schema by @felixfischer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10244
  • v5.10.47 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10245

New Contributors

  • @felixfischer made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.46...v5.10.47

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.48
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvements for payment token display (and preselection)
  • Minor fixes for Forte by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10246
  • v5.10.48 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10247

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.47...v5.10.48
